description: Avovite is an innovative avocado company focused on sustainable practices, growing and marketing avocados while promoting environmental and social responsibility. Founded in 2021, it aims to connect urban investors with agricultural projects, offering a unique model where individuals can invest in avocado production and receive profits over 20 years. The initiative emphasizes diversification, community employment, and ecological conservation, ensuring long-term viability and positive impacts on both the environment and local communities.
name: Avovite
